doc.field: - AB Volvo is issuing a 70 billion eurolire bond due May 31, 1990 paying 10-1/8 pct and priced at 100-1/2 pct, lead manager Banca Commerciale Italiana said. The bond is available in denominations of two mln lire and will be listed in London. Fees comprise 7/8 pct selling concession with 1/2 pct for management and underwriting combined. Payment date is April 24 and there will be a long first coupon.
